name: Pancake Drones
description:
Pancake Drones is currently in development, everything is subject to change

The food plane is here!

Eat pancakes, avoid pancake drones

Controls

Move - Arrow Keys

Pause  - P

Click the Debug menu in the top right corner to edit your game

Meet the Drones:

Pancake Drone

A typical drone that should not be eaten

 Transforming Drone

Disguised as a Syrup Pancake, these drones take time to come out of their shell

 Multi Drone

Not one drone-but two drones positioned parallel to each other

 Nest

There's a surprise inside

 Improvised Explosive Drone

Slowly walks over to its target and explodes, politely

 Sparkler

A crude cluster of pyrotechnics; explodes into smaller clusters of pyrotechnics

 Stunt Drone

Climbs atop the Drone Carrier and waits for the perfect opportunity to dive at its target

 Thumper

A 30-kg drone that drops from underneath the Drone Carrier, shaking the ground beneath it

 Balloon Drone

A drone that not only falls down, but also falls up. Not all models like balloons

 Telephony

A complicated drone that teleports within its moral compass

 Kite Drone

Despite not being manufactured with thrusters and wings, these drones found a way to fly

 Botfly

A drone that flies towards its target for exactly two seconds before giving up

The HTML5 version of Pancake Drones has several problems. Consider downloading the windows executable for a smoother experience 

Please report any bugs, and feel free to leave feedback
